entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
